dcterms:creator: M. Antonelli
A. Dushatskiy
M. Grewal
T. Alderliesten
P. A. N. Bosman
dcterms:description: A collection of 3D MRI-scans of the prostate, alongside their multi-class (Central and Peripheral prostate zones) segmentations. It contains 32 multi-modal scans, represented as a collection of 602 2D slices total. The scans were normalised, using Z-normalisation.
dcterms:title: Prostate Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Antonelli
A. Dushatskiy
M. Grewal
T. Alderliesten
P. A. N. Bosman
dcterms:description: A collection of 3D-CT scans and single class segmentations of the spleen. It contains 41 single modality scans represented as 3650 2D slices. The scans were clipped and normalised.
dcterms:title: Spleen Dataset
